titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of Legislative action binders from Governor Bangerter, 1986-1991.
titlestmt.author: Utah State Archives and Records Service
titlestmt.sponsor: Library Services and Technology Act (LSTA) grant, 2007-2008

publicationstmt.publisher: Utah State Archives and Records Service

profiledesc.creation: This series was processed by Alice Cone in 12/1999. Initial EAD encoding was completed by Elizabeth Perkes in August 2000.. Encoding system was created by Elizabeth Perkes in December 2007..
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid written in English in Latin script.
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: Finding aid reviewed for DACS and Utah Manuscript Association Best Practice Guidelines by Brandon Metcalf.

repository.corpname: Utah State Archives and Records Service

did.abstract: These binders form a synopsis of Governor Bangerter's interactions with the annual legislature.
did.physloc: These records are housed in the Utah State Archives' permanent storage room.

scopecontent.p: These binders form a synopsis of the governor's interactions with the annual legislature. The binders include information on the annual budget, including the governor's Budget in Brief; the final legislative bill summary report; a listing of bills passed; a description of the bills; and listings or transmittal letters for bills the Governor acted on by signing, allowing to become law without his signature, or vetoing. Press conferences, speeches about legislative activities, correspondence, and newspaper clippings which pertain to legislation also are included. The 1988 binder does not include any budget information.

accessrestrict.p: This series is classified as Public.

userestrict.p: These records are available for reproduction and use.

prefercite.p: Cite the Utah State Archives and Records Service, the creating agency name, the series title, and the series number.

custodhist.p: The material was taken by the governor when he left office and delivered to the Archives by former governor Bangerter in September 1999.

acqinfo.p: These records were acquired from the creating agency through established retention schedules.

processinfo.p: Processing was completed by A.C. Cone in December 1999. Filming was completed in March 2001 with the paper copy destroyed following filming.

relatedmaterial.p: Legislative case files from the Governor Bangerter, Series 8583, contain more detailed information on the governor's actions on individual bills.

Budget recommendations reports from the Governor's Office. Office of Planning and Budget, Series 84197, are the published budget recommendations, including the Budget in Brief, from all governors since 1923.
